body: @Every Genre Enjoyer What's there to understand. Idiot MC tried to make a deal with a demon and lost! He lost his body to an evil minion that will cruelly mistreat his ill sister and losing again from what I guess means the rest of his life force was taken meaning he'll die soon enough! In the end he was a complete failure who was better off not trying to make a deal with a demon to begin with if he was that much of a weakling. Now he's doomed himself and his sister to misery. At least you somewhat get a decent deal with the devil when you deal. Even if they get your soul, at least the few moments of enjoyment are allowed before your fucked. Here, he gets pleasured abit and got nothing but misery. His sister it sucks because she's not going to understand why her caring brother suddenly turned into a POS out of the blue who just wants to make her miserable (sort of reminds me of people you knew as kind suddenly turning into Assholes out of the blue and nowhere)
